name: 'Mr. Frost' Multiple Choice Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Catholic.

	Santos mentions this several times in the speeches he gives to the teachers about evolution and intelligent design.

questions.text: What was the real name of the man that Lou kept calling Ted?
questions.explanation:
Ned.

	Josh corrected Lou on Ned's name and Lou said she did it because she didn't like his head. Later, Josh called Ned by the name of Ted.

questions.text: The orchestra that the President was listening to at the end of the episode was playing whose music?
questions.explanation:
Mozart.

	While the President listened to Mozart being played, the camera went back to Santos, Josh, and Lou listening to a group of high school students playing in the orchestra.

Annabeth.

	Annabeth took Leo's watch because he kept looking at the time during the speech Santos was giving. When Annabeth took Leo's watch, Leo responded by telling Annabeth she wasn't a very tall person. Annabeth responded by telling him she thought he was fabulous.

questions.text: When was Leo to go before the Intelligence Committee about the leak?
questions.explanation:
Monday.

	Leo told Josh at Santos' speech, called the President from the plane, and told his lawyer at the campaign office.

questions.text: Did Mr. Frost get to speak to CJ about the assassinations?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Mr. Frost barged in CJ's office after she had woken from her nap and told her that Chairman Farad's assassination was planned and that the next assassination would occur in Kazakhstan.

Hooper.

	Margaret's last name is revealed for the first time in eight years when she is deposed about the space shuttle leak.

questions.text: What did the press called Santos' education week?
questions.explanation:
Boring week.

	Annabeth, Josh, and Lou were looking at what the press had to say about Santos and Leo in the reports. Annabeth told them what the press said about education week.

questions.text: Was the President of Kazakstan assassinated like Mr. Frost told CJ he would be?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	CJ didn't believe what Mr. Frost told her about the upcoming assassinations until she was down in the situation room and the assassination of the President of Kazakhstan happened while she was there.

questions.text: Who admitted to leaking information to the press about the space shuttle?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Toby came into CJ's office at the end of the episode and admitted to CJ that he was the leak.
